column4: Dear ubuntu-devs: If you give me a popup, that AN application wants to access the Default keyring, then have the decency to say WHICH application that is. I have 3 popups after each other on every login. And I don't like typing my password 4 times every login. Thanks
relly i set my key to unlock all apps
waent that the point in keyring so it didnt pup up 4 times heh
